alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 6:03PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bradford, eastern Alachua, north central Marion, northwestern Putnam and southern Clay Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 602 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Orange Springs, or 8 miles southwest of Interlachen, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Starke, Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Melrose, Fort McCoy, Citra, Hawthorne, New River, Florahome and Melrose Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Western Clay; Western Putnam
